answer:
Public flu clinics are organized at the health authority level. Please contact your local health unit to discuss this further and to find out if this could be an option in your area. You can find the contact information for your local health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
question: Can a library be a public location, if they wish, for a flu clinic? Libraries are open to the public, have public meeting rooms and have many at risk patrons, which is a win/win for public awareness.
question_variation_0: why libraries are open to the public
question_variation_1: what are library open to the public
question_variation_2: why is library open to the public
